backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a scoreboard with functions to record player scores, retrieve all scores in ascending/descending order, and get specific score entries by index with bounds checking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the keyboard controls debug/fix feature, linking it to useGameControls.ts and test requirement REQ-6 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the 3D cyberpunk-themed game application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for the cyberpunk UI design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root, index, game, and leaderboard routes, all wrapped in GameLayout component with RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/Game3DScene.tsx: React Three Fiber 3D game scene with player sphere, collectible orbs, moving obstacles, collision detection, power-up mechanics, and game loop using useFrame hook.
frontend/src/components/GameControls.tsx: UI component displaying keyboard control instructions for WASD/arrow keys movement and ESC pause in a styled cyberpunk-themed panel.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper applying cyberpunk gradient background with game background image overlay and grid pattern effects to all child routes.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Leaderboard display component fetching scores via useLeaderboard hook, showing ranked entries with trophy icons for top 3 and formatted player principals and scores.
frontend/src/components/PowerUpIndicator: HUD component conditionally rendering active power-up status with icon, animated glow effects, and invincibility label.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and managing backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated actors with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameControls.ts: Custom hook managing keyboard input state for WASD, arrow keys, and space bar with event listeners, preventing stale closures by using functional state updates and empty dependency array.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameEngine.ts: Provides game engine utilities for collision detection, orb spawning at random positions, and obstacle spawning from random edges with velocities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Hook that wraps the getAllScoresDescending query to provide leaderboard data with loading state and refresh capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook to fetch all scores in descending order from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScoreSubmission.ts: Hook for submitting player scores to the backend using React Query mutations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom neon-themed color variables (cyan, magenta, yellow) and utility classes for glows, shadows, and grid patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main game page component managing game state (menu, playing, paused, gameover), score tracking, power-ups, and rendering the 3D scene with HUD overlays.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Leaderboard page displaying top scores with header, navigation back to game, and footer with attribution.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom neon colors, shadows, animations, and OKLCH color space support.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features, known issue with direction controls, and pending game state management feature request.
